SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Energy Conversion Efficiency?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Energy Conversion Efficiency is Power Transmission and Distribution Loss Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Revenue Growth Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Energy Conversion Efficiency is Revenue Growth Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Renewable Energy Investment Ratio, is the point for Bennett-Bradley inside or outside the point for Weiss Group?
SRP.A: On the Renewable Energy Investment Ratio, the point for Bennett-Bradley is inside the point for Weiss Group.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Revenue Growth Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Bennett-Bradley?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Revenue Growth Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Patent Growth Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension R&D Investment Ratio, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On R&D Investment Ratio, label {Bradford Ltd} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Energy Conversion Efficiency, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Energy Conversion Efficiency, label {Bennett-Bradley} scores the lowest.

EVJ.A: The maximum value of Bennett-Bradley across all dimensions is {69}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label Weiss Group across all dimensions in the radar chart?

NC.Q: For Weiss Group, which dimension has a higher score: Patent Growth Rate or R&D Investment Ratio?
NC.A: {R&D Investment Ratio} has a higher score than Patent Growth Rate for Weiss Group.

NC.Q: On Revenue Growth Rate, which label has a higher score: Weiss Group or the Bradford Ltd?
NC.A: {Bradford Ltd} has a higher score on Revenue Growth Rate compared to Weiss Group.

NC.Q: For Bennett-Bradley, which dimension has a higher score: R&D Investment Ratio or Energy Conversion Efficiency or Power Transmission and Distribution Loss Rate?
NC.A: {R&D Investment Ratio} has a higher score for Bennett-Bradley.

NC.A: {R&D Investment Ratio} has a higher score for Weiss Group.

MSR.Q: For Bennett-Bradley, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Bennett-Bradley most needs to improve its {Patent Growth Rate}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
